I am changing this review since it is old, and I have found love for the game. They fixed some of the issues I had with it and now, it runs smooth and it works great!

My first rewiew so bare with me.

This is a really fun game and simple enough.
Four survivals, trying to get out of a compound and a killer that are trying to slaughter them. You can choose several killers (like Mike Myers or a crazy hillbilly with a chainsaw) and several survivals, depending on your preference. The leveling system is easy. You get bloodpoints for winning or loosing but of course more for winning. You spend them on perks, skills, offerings and some items that you use in game. At the same time the more bloodpoints you spend the higher level you get, 50 is max level. The more games you win the lower rank you get, starting at 20 (lowest) and max is numero uno (highest).

Play solo or with friends. I´d say that its a bit more fun to play with friends but unfortunatly i dont have that many friends playing this game so its more solo for me, still very funny.

Now to the sad part - the game is buggy. It gets better all the time with patches but still buggy. I cant play survival without playing a killer game first! and i cant play two games in a row as a survival. As a killer there is no problem, so i mostly play killer. Its a bit sad because it would be fun to mix more between killer and survival.

If you can endure these bugs, this game is a diamond in the rough. As i said earlier, the game gets better with each patch. Enough? I dont know only you can decide that.

Arkadaşlarınız ile oynamak oldukça keyifli olsa da sunucular çoğu zaman problem çıkartıyor. Bazen lobiye giriş yaparken hata veriyor hatta kimi zamanlarda ise sunucu problemlerinden ötürü oyunun ana menüsüne dahi ulaşamıyorsunuz. Şimdiye kadar ptimizasyon ile ilgili herhangi bir problem yaşamamış olsam da sunucuların sebep olduğu durumlar çoğu kez keyfinizi kaçırıyor. Oyunu, bu hali ile kesinlikle tavsiye etmiyorum.
Das Spiel bringt mir viel Spaß bisher, obwohl ich mir viele Bewertungen vorher durchgelesen habe.

Ne fonctionne pas sur le service de streaming que j utilise. Les peripheriques clqvier et souris sont bloquer a cause de la mise a jour anti bot apparamment. Malgre de nombreuses plainte d utilisateur du service en question sur le jeu les developpeurs n ont strictement rien fait. La solution est pourtant tres simple a mettre en place. Les devs ne semble pas trop se preoccuper de la communaute, apres tout quelque centaines de client en moins sa ne change pas grand chose a leurs reputation deja bien  degrade.
NICEE!!!! GREAT GAME!

Dead by Daylight é um jogo é muito divertido e é mais legal ainda jogar com os amigos. To vendo muitas análises negativas de pessoas que estavam reclamando de bugs, que ja foram corrigidos há muito tempo, sobre a falta de um sistema de party, que foi colocado, no máximo, uns dois updates depois do lançamento do jogo e o pior, pessoas crucificando O JOGO por ele ter players que não sabem jogar da "maneira correta" (de uma forma que todos se divirtam) ao invés de reportar esse jogador. O jogo tem bugs mas não são do tipo que estragam a experiencia (como muitos dizem e/ou dão a entender que são). Definitivamente, o jogo não merece todo esse hate que, na maioria das vezes, vem de pessoas que nem tentaram jogar e/ou que não tiveram um pouco mais de paciência pra ver se os bugs (que nem estragavam o game) eram corrigidos e ver as novas features que os desenvolvedores botariam(e ainda botam) pra melhorar ainda mais o game. O único pedido que eu faço PRA QUEM ESCREVEU AS ANÁLISES SÓ POR NÃO TER TIDO UM POUCO MAIS DE PACIÊNCIA COM O JOGO (lembrando que se tu tem algum motivo real pra não gostar do jogo e quis expor a tua opinião, não tem nada de errado) parem de jogar por um tempo e depois voltem com a mente mais aberta e calma e deem uma jogada (lembrando que com os brother é melhor ainda SAUSHUHSAUHSU). Obrigado :D <3
Отличная игра)

RESUMO DESSE JOGO = MUITO DESEQUILIBRADO E MAL PLANEJADO.

Tentei jogar essa merda durante um bom tempo para ver se eu aprendia técnicas para lidar com os killer.. já tentei de tudo.. fazer build para se esconder .. build para achar escotilha e o resumo é o seguinte..
Quando o killer tem bons perks e addons é impossivel jogar contra.. 

Para se ter uma ideia de como esse jogo foi mal pensado.. tem um perk que faz o personagem correr mais rápido ao pular de um lugar alto.. e adivinha... tem mapas que não tem a porra de um lugar alto para pular... adivinha de novo... os mapas sao aleatorios.

Tem muitos locais nos mapas que não possuem janela ou tábua para fugir você só aceita a queda...

Evoluir nesse jogo é muito lento, então demora muito para conseguir perks utéis nos sobreviventes para conseguir alguma chance contra o monstro.

E esse perks nem ajudam tanto.. se você for visto por um killer certamente você vai morrer independente dos perks..

Antes de escrever essa análise estava jogando uma partida.. o monstro estava indo na minha direção... e eu estava terminando de abrir a porta para fugir..
Ele estava quase chegando... e eu não sabia se iria dar tempo de abrir...
Consegui abrir e fui em direção a saída...
Até que quando cheguei perto da saída percebi eu não poderia fugir porque o killer tinha um perk que bloqueava a saída 
=DDDDDDDDDDDDD.

Dai você pensa, então vou jogar de monstro para conseguir a moeda do jogo e gastar nos sobreviventes para evolui-los, pois é , não da para jogar de monstro porque todo mundo quer jogar.

Jocul este super,content destul de mare sar mai necesita niste update-uri. O mica optimizare nu ar strica si chiar daca nu o faceti acest joc tot tare e. In schimb despre camperi am multe de spus de ce un Hillbilly camper are voie sa stea cu drujba incarcata 99% si daca un survivor vine el il da pe jos. Ar trebui sa banati mai multi playeri. Dar o mare problema: SCHIMBAREA DE PUTERI INTRE KILLERI. Unii killeri schimba putrerea si pentru acel killer puterea altuia este foarte OP. Asa ca in concluzie jocul este cam prost optimizat si mai trebuie niste update-uri si sa repararti bugurile cat mai repede. Din cand in cand mai bagati si content nou.

нуйс

I honestly really really enjoy this game. It is one of the funnest games I have played in years, but it has some glaring problems that really need to be addressed.
   
   For starters, there is no dedicated server system implemented in this game, and that would be alright if they had a better anti-cheat system in place to punish people that flip on their lag switch or who just decide to download right as the match actually starts. 

   On top of this, if the killer gets into a map that they do not like, they can decide to leave, which costs every single survivor a pip, or progession towards their next rank. Why in the world is this still a problem? That is an incredibly basic, fundamental way to look at a competitive game; someone leaves- they are punished, not the people that had no control over what the other team decided to do. There are survivors that are still wanting to play, and a killer dodging a specific map isnt something that the devs can control, but punishing survivors for that? It makes no sense at all.

   Despite these issues I still find this game incredibly fun and it's community has stuck out the bull longer than any of the newer AAA games that have come out in recent years; I recommend giving Dead by Daylight a try.

Quote from far below; "If you havent bought this game yet, I do not see any real reason why you should jump into it."

------------------------------------
Part written 16th of February, 2018 (year later than initial review that can be found below)

I do not know where to start. This game got me back into it around late summer 2017, when finally the technical advancement with matchmaking process was good enough, and they were adding interesting killer DLCs to the game. I even bought a few!

Changes in 2017 seemed to make it more balanced, even though it never really went to the area of excellent. This game is sold as a co-op experience, where you work together to survive and escape from "the ruthless killer". But in Dead By Daylight, you will soon realise that killers arent something to be afraid of.

Lets underline [u]work together[/u]. It means survivors talk over comms, agree that who will go save their friend as two of them finish generators. I think that is the way survivors were expected to play, and thankfully some do. But then there are these parties where survivors have come to the game with one single purpose - not play the objective of repairing generators but to run around the killer and straight up bully that player.

It is not a problem for killer, by persevering killer kills all of these, if keeping his head cool.

But player, ask yourself this; does it sound like fun experience? For months on months, people who "main" killer aka play as killer most of the time, do not simply find this game enjoyable. Balancing has always been dreadful in this game, and the changes that gave me hope were the fixes to just broken things like flashlight stun during hooking, placing a trap directly under the hooked survivor and so on... Cheese, broken moves that were possible due to inadept work of the developers.

You can report players for things like botting, not playing the objective, TAKING THE GAME AS HOSTAGE which in my opinion is RICH. It can be done yes, and they have known it for years. During that time, they never tried to come up with design choices that would prevent the possibility of this. That is extremely saddening, do you know many games that allow that? I know this, and that Mordheim.

Just take my word on it, they have zero play testing of their game. Many patches bring in new problems, while "fixing" something. But if only these fixes would not be re-rolls to the way game used to be back in time. Here is a little collage I would like you to read.

#######################
Patch 1.1.2 - 23 September 2016
[BUG FIXES]

Fixed an issue which caused the Flashlight Stun Drop to not be triggered while hooking up and picking up a Survivor

Patch 1.1.2a - 27 September 2016 
[BALANCING]

Disabled the possibility of flashlight stuns during Hooking & Picking Up Animations

Patch 1.9.2 - 15 February 2018
[BALANCING]

Fixed an issue that made it impossible to rescue a dying survivor with a pallet/flashlight save while being picked up or dropped mid animation. Now, the pick up/drop animation will play fully, followed by the flashlight/pallet stun.
#######################

As you can see, they had a vision of a feature that they removed in 4 days due to the backlash of the player base. The recent change is also a revert, it was like this back in the time.

Developers have their just right to develop the game towards the view they have, but players also have the just base for their opinions about it. Many agree this revert is unneeded, because already surviving in this game is decently easy. I just ask; why we keep going back and forth with things we thought were settled for the game? No one asked for these reverts. Only the developers who have admitted they dont really play the game themselves.

New bug with the patch 1.9.2 is with sounds, they are broken. By broken, I mean game plays wrong sound effects at wrong time. Instead of heart beat that indicates how close killer is, you get music. Bad big time, since heart beat gets more intense the closer killer is. Core feature of a game, now broken with music playing instead.

Developers just dont deliver. They do not know about balancing as they try to do it through perks or rock-paper-scissors -kind of enabling of possible in-game moves. Yes, no, yes, no yes, yes yes, nooo. Make up your mind, devs.

If you havent bought this game yet, I do not see any real reason why you should jump into it. You will have fun for the first hours until you really start to see how broken in the core it is. It is not the vision you get from the marketing, I quarantee you this.

I have clocked about 180hours I think, and I say the time spent is survivor 60% - killer 40%. Seen both sides fairly well, I see myself enjoying the idea of playing the killer but I do not enjoy the experience. Just the concept. And I am pretty sure "killer mains" out there agree with me on this. Playing killer subjects you for bullying, and it will take place more often than we all like to admit.

Pretty sure that my road with DbD ends on this month, still bought the Jigsaw DLC three weeks ago and regret it fully. At least I learnt from that, no more money into this game.

------------------------------------
Initial review 31th of January 2017:

A game that has great gameplay, but then just otherwise broken system.

Most of my game time has been spent in the lobby, since matchmaking just doesn't deliver. And right now, devs have confirmed there are problems with the matchmaking when you que up with 3-4 party.

Dont get me wrong. Hosts (killers) more often leave the lobby than let it roll, when a big party shows up. So on top of bugged matchmaking, you have this kind of unsportmanlike behavior from players.

I tried to be killer couple of times, but even on those cases - people just didnt come to the lobby too often...

I will change my review, and actually write stuff about the game but right now my morale will not let me encourage anyone to buy this. I hope this changes soon.

------------------------------------
Added 3rd of February, 2017

The developers announced that console port for PS4 and XBone will come in Q2 2017. There is one big patch coming up, so unless that repairs these matchmaking issues, dont expect fix too soon.

This game is an outright mess, managed to get into 1 fucking game while trying it out (the killer hook-camped the whole match) and the rest of the time i was staring at a loading screen and from what i can see on the forums, alot of people are having the exact same problem... refund while you can or better yet, just dont buy this pile of crap no matter how fun the twitch streamers tell you it is, the game is UNPLAYABLE in the state it is in right now.

tension.. tension.. TENSION! A horror game done right. Plenty of horror games out there that simply go in for the cheap shock factors. Dead by Daylight dispenses with all of this by ridding you of any notion that you're safe. Instead, replacing it with the slow, bubbling tension of not knowing when you may be set upon.

Thoroughly enjoyable as either survivor or killer.

PROS:
- Reasonably unique gameplay style.
- Nce use of skill checks throughout gameplay.
- Nice system for perks and items as you level up.

CONS:
- Requires all survivors to do their part and help each other when captured by the killer... this sometimes doesn't happen!
- Some killers feel a little bit OP but I'm sure these things will be tweaked
- Would be nice to have more forms of communication between survivors. Some form of whispering when close by over voice channel or even more gestures would be great

All in all, thoroughly enjoyable game even if it does have some matchmaking issues at the moment :)

О плохом:
(1)В игре ОЧЕНЬ дерьмовое комьюнити (я бы предложил говорить не ,,Ты дотер? Значит ты быдло,, а ,, Ты играешь в dbd? Значит ты либо ноющий и скулящий щенок, либо ***** юзающий баги и т.п.,,После игры в dbd моя страница начала превращаться в мусорное ведро в вашей квартире.Вечно полное и жутко воняет.Почитал бы кто, то что я удалил он бы подумал что я воплощение сатаны и я живой пример слияния рака мозга, аутизма,СПИДа,шизофрении.
 
Грубо говоря игра делится на 3 стороны
1 сторона это маньяки
2 сторона это сурвы
3 сторона это разрабы
О каждой подробнее

1) Маньяки это люди которые будут либо играть на БП либо на Удовольствие(вторые будут попадаться куда реже) 

Маньяки которые будут играть на БП будут добиваться их любыми способами юзать баги,кемпить, фармить БП на отдельных сервах, хейтить классно играющих выживших и они не отпустят в люк последнего сурва который мансил всю игру но у него тима 20 и изза этого он слился.Я отношусь скорее всего к этим маньякам (потом объясню почему)

Маньяки, которые играют в удовольствие, будут играть так, как хотят (Тоесть они могут кемпить, а могут нет, с такими маньяками чаще всего играть интереснее ,НО вот проблема,если ты хочешь играть в удовольствие ты должен иметь либо а) Прямые руки
б) Станок который печатает БП, так как за БП ты можешь купить подношение на карту на которой тебе хотелось поиграть(А НЕ НА СРАНОЙ ФЕРМЕ НА КОТОРОЙ Я ИГРАЮ КАЖДУЮ ИГРУ МЛЯТЬ)купить аддон с которым тебе будет приятнее играть и т.п.
Тоесть если хочешь играть в удовольствие ты должен фармить БП=> Все маньяки из 2 разряда можно отнести к 1 разряду.

2)Сурвы делятся на а) вечно ноющих *****, которые найдут имбу там где её нету,которые напишут тысячу и одно рук-во где опишут какие имбовые маньяки или какие ****** разработчики а сурвы это дети Иесуса которые мучаются за грехи людские(нет).Эти сурвы как правило и ноют мол типо ,,Фу паймал толька дваих а меня с петей нит ахзазах,,
или ,,В люк ни атпустил ****,, Встретя таких сурвов не надейтесь что они простят вас и не найдут что вставить в ваших родителей.Эти сурвы и расписываются когда нерфят их любимый спринт ,, Спринт нерфанули сук,, ,,Далой цариа,, ,,#СПРИНТЖИВИ,, и т.п.
Обычно после встречи с такими ваша страница может превратиться в помойку.
б) адекватных людей, которые редко будут общаться с сурвами из первой группы, они будут играть так, как хотели бы чтобы сурвы играли с ними ,когда они маньяки.

3)Это разрабы, которые находятся между двух огней(пердаков) сурвов и маньяков(нытиков и кемперов ко ко ко).Знаете что объединяет маньяков и сурвов? ОНИ ВСЕ ВИНЯТ РАЗРАБОТЧИКОВ ВО ВСЁМ.Появился баг где сурв может залезть под шкаф или т.п. Виноваты разрабы , а не багоюзер.Все маньяки используют билд машинган? Виноваты разрабы, а не сурвы которые не могут мансить вокруг доски.
Все кто так делали(и я в том числе) задумайтесь! Задумайтесь все!
С одной стороны вам в ухо бубнят маньяки требующие нерфа выживших.
С другой стороны вам в ухо бубнят сурвы требующие нерфа маньяков.
Вы не знаете кого слушать, т.к. ноют вроде правильно, но всё идёт в тупик и начало там же где конец. 
К примеру: Маньяки кемпят, почему? Потому что сурвы абузят инфиниты где их нельзя догнать и в наглую подставляются закрывая своими тушами раненых.Почему сурвы так делают? Потому что маньяки кемпят.
Я думаю вы поняли о чём я.

Easily the buggiest game I've ever played. Forever long loading screens just for 2 survivors to leave and having to restart the client multiple times = 0 fun.

When I bought the game it was "good", in case you made it into one match after playing "lobby-simulator" for a while. Guess they attracted the most people to buy it at that time.
Then the DLC strategy took place, introducing way too overpowered killers into the game, maybe because the killer players whined all the time that they missed one out of four survivors, maybe because the developers themselves have a sadistic killer has to win all the time-opinion. Besides, the developers dont seem to care about the communities opinion at all since the start.
Now its just DLC, DLC, DLC and you have to pay for each of them the same amount you get a whole and complete other independent game for if you choose and look around carefully. All the bugs are already mentioned in other comments, so if you dont swim in money, drive around this game and dont become frustrated yourself!

Sounds fun. id love to be able to play it but if u have triple monitors the game does NOT allow you to reduce resolution to standard resolutions in either fullscreen or windowed. They use some kind of slider that does NOT work for multimonitors. Also editing config files does nothing about the problem. 

DO NOT BUY if using More then 1 monitor!!

Edit:  All playtime is spent trying to get game to work.

El concepto y el juego es la hostia, pero tirarte 2 horas buscando partida, luego que uno que estaba contigo acabe en otra partida, luego que cargando la partida te mande al menú y entre solo tu amigo, que al bajar del gancho a veces se raye así de gratis y te caigas bajo el mapa muriendo en el vacío inevitablemente, y que el sistema de Host sea del año 2006 y aquí siga presente dando total equilibrio a que te toque un asesino con lag, porque siempre son los hosts, y te joda toda la partida, pues ya no mola tanto

Ahora bien, si no os importa jugar 10 horas y pero que 5 sean buscando partidas por diversos fallos que he comentado, adelante, un juegazo

PD: para qué arreglarlo, mejor sacamos dlcs ^^

После скидок на игру начался адский трешак. хотя он и раньше был, но в данный момент это перешло рамки возможного. толпы школьников, которые играют за маньяка, вешают на крюк и в упор стоят возле твоего тела. В это время вся команда под шумок заводит генераторы и сваливает. спросите вы, разве никто не пытался помочь? а там БЕСПОЛЕЗНО! сколько ты не отвлекай этого идиота, он не на шаг не сдвинется, стоит в упор и не шевелится... ранее были подобные дег... кхм... маньяки, но редко... сейчас же каждая вторая катка... хотя спасибо им за это) очков кучу нафармил так) можно всю карту вынести, пока эти бараны ждут смерти одного. хотя сам знаю. со стороны подвешенного это не так весело

The game is extremely fun at times, but the longer you stay with the community the more you will realize how completely tone-deaf, biased, and greedy the devs are. They literally have next to no understanding how the balance of their own game works and it becomes incredibly infuriating when you get horrible balance patches that mess up the game. Oh did I already mention they're greedy? Most cosmetics cost twice the price of actual characters. Many outfits are locked behind payed battle passes. And a lot of cosmetics are just lazy reskins. The devs have become increasingly complacent with the quality of their game and it's been suffering massively lately because of it. As of the current state of the game, I cannot recommend it. I am close to quitting for good after 2200 hours of play. I sincerely hope the devs get a massive wake-up call or this game will die within the next year.
